title: 为什么我安装JDK6时会这样啊？
author: Prideland_owner
txt_content:
RTdalao们 我该怎么办啊 
急求！！ 谢谢

replies.author: gouj511
replies.txt_content:
java官方有一个页面在讲这个报错
https://www.java.com/en/download/help/error_1722.xml
下面给出的解决方式是
Please follow the steps below for resolving this issue.
Remove any traces of the failed Java installation by uninstalling Java
Download and install the Windows offline installer package.
将安装失败的java完全卸载（就控制面板里）
然后下载离线安装包
